import React, { Component } from 'react' export class SignUp extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { finalData: { email: "", password : "" }, tempData:{ email: "", pass1: "", pass2: "", password: "", agreed: false } } this.switchToSignUp = this.switchToSignUp.bind(this) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } switchToSignUp(){ this.props.childSwitcher() } handleChange(event){ //valami ilyesmi kell majd let copiedTempData = this.state.tempData switch (event.target.name){ case "email": copiedTempData.email = event.target.value this.setState({finalData: copiedTempData}) console.log(this.state) break case "pass1": copiedTempData.password = event.target.value this.setState({finalData: copiedTempData}) console.log(this.state) break default: console.log("ohh") } } handleSubmit(event){ console.log(this.state.finalData) this.props.signYouUp(this.state.finalData) event.preventDefault() } render() { return (

Sign Up

) } } export default SignUp
